name: C. W. Stoneking
description: '''Christopher William Stoneking''' (born 15 March 1974) is an Australian [[Blues music|blues]] singer-songwriter, guitarist and [[banjo]] player. At the [[ARIA Music Awards of 2009]] ''Jungle Blues'' won [[ARIA Award for Best Blues and Roots Album|Best Blues and Roots Album]]; he was also nominated for Best Male Artist, Breakthrough Artist â€“ Album, Best Independent Release and Best Cover Art. ''[[Gon' Boogaloo]]'' peaked at No. 17 on the [[ARIA Charts|ARIA Albums Chart]] and won at the 2015 ARIA Music Awards for Best Blues & Roots Album.
